description: Want to cool down on a hot Atlanta day? Stop by Kona Ice for the perfect frozen treat - shaved ice! With a variety of yummy flavors that are all lower-calorie and sweetened naturally, you simply can't go wrong with this delicious yet nutritious sweet treat. Adults and kids alike oughta follow the vibrant sounds of steel drums and tropical tunes all the way up to Kona Ice so that they can load up their own cups with refreshing fruity flavors straight from the Flavorwave. Perfect for parties of every size, is the fun and festive Kona Ice!
name: Kona Ice Midtown
